embeds.title: ChromeOS release channel roles
embeds.description:
We have roles for all 4 of the ChromeOS release channels, as well as a role for Developer Mode. For the Stable, Beta and Developer channels, you will also be pinged when a blog post for an update is pushed.

To assign yourself a role, react by clicking on the relevant emoji below.

 **Roles with update notifications**:
:regional_indicator_s:: <@&550382017213104147> (About 1 ping every 2-3 weeks, when stable updates release)
:regional_indicator_b:: <@&550401535578996754> (About 1 ping every week, when beta updates release)
:regional_indicator_d:: <@&550401653732540417> (About 2 pings every week, when developer updates release)

**Roles without updates:
**:regional_indicator_c:: <@&701055720468119593>
:hammer_pick:: <@&699314025011478579>
